attributes.action: bring Tul Bahadur Pun VC be brought to this country at Government expense and be made a British citizen.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tul Bahadur Pun VC is 84 years og age. he was in the Gurkha regiment for 18 years. In 1974 the it appears he was told he must hand his VC back to the Army for safekeeping and paid £500. last year this was sold for £500,000. The veteran is in receipt of £132 monthly pension. he has 11 other campaign medals. he wanted to come to live and die in Britain and with the help of old comrades applied but was refused a visa. This may go to a court judge to decide. This should not be decided by a court. This veteran needs our support in his hour of need, when he gave his support in our hour of need

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
